children.description: The children to render inside the Item

as.description: the element type to render as

elementRef.description: provides a reference to the underlying html root element

margin.description:
Valid values are `0`, `none`, `auto`, `xxx-small`, `xx-small`, `x-small`,
`small`, `medium`, `large`, `x-large`, `xx-large`. Apply these values via
familiar CSS-like shorthand. For example: `margin="small auto large"`.

padding.description:
Valid values are `0`, `none`, `xxx-small`, `xx-small`, `x-small`,
`small`, `medium`, `large`, `x-large`, `xx-large`. Apply these values via
familiar CSS-like shorthand. For example: `padding="small x-large large"`.

align.description: overrides the parent Flex's alignItems prop, if needed

direction.description: Inherits from the parent Flex component

textAlign.description: Designates the text alignment inside the Item

shouldGrow.description: Should the FlexItem grow to fill any available space?

shouldShrink.description: Should the FlexItem shrink (stopping at its `size`)?

size.description: Sets the base size of the FlexItem (width if direction is `row`; height if direction is `column`)

withVisualDebug.description: Places dashed lines around the component's borders to help debug your layout

order.description:
Specifies the order of the `Flex.Item` inside the `Flex` component.

Utilizes the order flex CSS property.
